Assumptions: All currently installed pipelines will not be retired before 2050.
Includes both interstate and intrastate pipelines. Piepline operating pressures. Pipeline diameters.

Source: `EIA Natural Gas Gross Withdrawals and Production <https://www.eia.gov/dnav/ng/ng_prod_sum_a_EPG0_VGM_mmcf_a.htm>`_

Assumptions: Starting level state of charge. Includes salt cavers, depleted fields, and aquifers. Not extendable.

Source: `EIA International & Interstate Movements of Natural Gas by State <https://www.eia.gov/dnav/ng/ng_move_ist_a2dcu_nus_a.htm>`_
`EIA U.S. Natural Gas Imports by Point of Entry <https://www.eia.gov/dnav/ng/ng_move_poe1_a_EPG0_IRP_Mmcf_a.htm>`_
Assumptions: A state can only trade with one other province. If the sate is connected to two provinces, the larger capacity connection is taken as the connection.
